name: PONG - but you control the ball
name_original: PONG - but you control the ball
description:
My entry to the 2022 PongJam (Hosted by Scott Melanson), celebrating 50 years of the seminal classic, PONG.

Controls are W+S, P+L or Cursors Up and Down.

Control the ball and try to keep it in play. Points are scored for each paddle hit.

Sounds are from Universal Sound FX
